definitions.text: the world of commercial activity where goods and services are bought and sold
examples: without competition there would be no market
they were driven from the marketplace

definitions.text: the customers for a particular product or service
examples: before they publish any book they try to determine the size of the market for it

definitions.text: a marketplace where groceries are sold
examples: the grocery store included a meat market

definitions.text: the securities markets in the aggregate
examples: the market always frustrates the small investor

definitions.text: an area in a town where a public mercantile establishment is set up
engage in the commercial promotion, sale, or distribution of
examples: The company is marketing its new line of beauty products
Some Amish people have commercialized their way of life
